= Git User's Survey 2009 =

The Git User's Survey 2009 has not yet begun.

You will be able to take part in this survey <i>(tentatively)</i> 
from <b>15 July</b> to <b>15 September 2009</b>.

* http://tinyurl.com/[[GitSurvey]]2009 (expands to the link below)
* http://www.survs.com/survey?id=2PIMZGU0&channel=Q0EKJ3NF54

Or you can choose version which does not require cookies, but it
doesn't allow to go back to response and edit it.

* http://www.survs.com/survey?id=2PIMZGU0&channel=1MH6FTZV5O
